<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> representing the format an expression value should be textualized into for matching.

Used to represent both explicit format specifiers as well as implicit format from using numeric variables.

Definition at line 38 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h">FileCheckImpl.h</a>.

### enum class  {#a8aa1badb3ecc62f86172f9f85928fb61}

<MemberDefinition

 labels = {["strong"]}>

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a8aa1badb3ecc62f86172f9f85928fb61aa305d2e7bbf7ddc98728fa844c9e210e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NoFormat">
Denote absence of format
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a8aa1badb3ecc62f86172f9f85928fb61aa1a914735b205424ba6c40b85528d78a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Unsigned">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is an unsigned integer and should be printed as a decimal number
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a8aa1badb3ecc62f86172f9f85928fb61a71fed0c3428bf1a2e19af257c4bac379" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Signed">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is a signed integer and should be printed as a decimal number
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a8aa1badb3ecc62f86172f9f85928fb61a71c7fabc0d41ad9cf4ddf4857b98615b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="HexUpper">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> should be printed as an uppercase hex number
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a8aa1badb3ecc62f86172f9f85928fb61a64aea1932b88d7985edd8a140425a3a3" />
<EnumerationListItem name="HexLower">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> should be printed as a lowercase hex number
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

the string representation of <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> in the format represented by this instance, or an error if conversion to this format failed or the format is NoFormat.
</SectionUser>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::string &gt; ExpressionFormat::getWildcardRegex () const</>}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
a wildcard regular expression string that matches any value in the format represented by this instance and no other value, or an error if the format is NoFormat.
</SectionUser>
